actions.text: Amendment SA 2438 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 155.

Amendment SA 2438 proposed by Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S4353-4354; text: CR S4353-4354) To establish highly erodible land and wetland conservation compliance requirements for the Federal crop insurance program.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2438 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 155.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2438 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 155.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2438 proposed by Senator Chambliss.

purpose: To establish highly erodible land and wetland conservation compliance requirements for the Federal crop insurance program.
